<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<style>
  .table-collage {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
    gap: 20px;
  }
  .table {
    border-collapse: collapse;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    width: 100%;
  }
  .table img {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
  }
  .table td {
    padding: 10px;
    vertical-align: top;
  }
  .table-link {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 10px;
  }
</style>
<title>Music Collage</title>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="table-collage">
